tasks.task: Participate in an event promoting pulses.
subtasks: Attend the event and learn about pulses' benefits.
Taste various pulses at the event.
Express interest in incorporating pulses into regular diet.

tasks.task: Understand mutation breeding for pulse crops.
subtasks: Learn about the history and application of mutation breeding.
Recognize improved pulse varieties through mutation breeding.

tasks.task: Grasp the role of pulses in soil fertility.
subtasks: Understand pulse roots' nitrogen absorption and release.
appreciate pulses' contribution to natural fertilization.

tasks.task: Recognize pulses' significance in sustainable development.
subtasks: Acknowledge pulses'长久以来的种植历史。
appreciate pulses' recent recognition as nutrient-rich.
Understand pulses as key crop for sustainable development.

tasks.task: Plant pulses to improve soil fertility.
Use nuclear techniques for mutation breeding in pulse crops.
Employ mutation breeding for pulse crop improvement.
Promote sustainable agriculture by highlighting the benefits of pulses.
Utilize isotopes to assess nitrogen fixation in pulses.
